DOC.brief_summary: THE PURPOSE OF THE STUDY IS COMPARE THE QUANTITY OF DISTAL MOVEMENT OF THE UPPER CANINE AND MOLAR USING CLASS II ELASTICS WITH AND WITHOUT SLIDING JIG IN A PERIOD OF 3 MONTHS
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Quantity Distal Movement Upper Canine Molar
DOC.detailed_description: To achieve Class I canine relationship end alignment level phase , different intraoral device use . These include intermaxillary class II elastic , retract upper protract lower arch , generate extrusive force anchorage sit . Its upper distalizing action exert canine bracket transmit posterior teeth upper molar receive direct force . The slide jig auxiliary addition exerts force molar elastic hang jig lateral canine class II ; mechanism decrease vertical adverse effect elastic wear direct distalizing force molar . A randomized , unblinded , clinical trial compare 30 unit analysis ( hemi arch ) place slide jig stand alone elastic perform .
